description: This is a paginated call to list linked accounts that are linked to the payer account for the specified time period. If no information is provided, the current billing period is used. The response will optionally include the billing group that's associated with the linked account.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: The filter on the account ID of the linked account, or any of the following: MONITORED: linked accounts that are associated to billing groups. UNMONITORED: linked accounts that aren't associated to billing groups. Billing Group Arn: linked accounts that are associated to the provided billing group Arn. Association (string) --- MONITORED: linked accounts that are associated to billing groups. UNMONITORED: linked accounts that are not associated to billing groups. Billing Group Arn: linked accounts that are associated to the provided Billing Group Arn. AccountId (string) --- The Amazon Web Services account ID to filter on. AccountIds (list) --- The list of Amazon Web Services IDs to retrieve their associated billing group for a given time range. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Association
nested_params.description: MONITORED: linked accounts that are associated to billing groups. UNMONITORED: linked accounts that are not associated to billing groups. Billing Group Arn: linked accounts that are associated to the provided Billing Group Arn.

nested_params.name: AccountId
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID to filter on.

nested_params.name: AccountIds
nested_params.description: The list of Amazon Web Services IDs to retrieve their associated billing group for a given time range.

nested_items.name: LinkedAccounts
nested_items.description: The list of linked accounts in the payer account.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The associating array of account IDs.

nested_items.name: BillingGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Billing Group Arn that the linked account is associated to.

nested_items.name: AccountName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account name.

nested_items.name: AccountEmail
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account email.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that's used on subsequent calls to get accounts.
